title.rendered: Cheap Sim Free Mobile Phones under £500

content.rendered:
Cheap doesn’t mean losing out on good functionality. Many lesser priced sim free phones are priced to be competitive in a market place where the Apple iPhone and Samsung Galaxy are a leading sought-after brand name. Check out a selection of our best sim free mobile phone dealsunder £500.

Apple iPhone 6S Sim Free Deal

  • Released – September 2015
  • Build – Aluminium Body with Front Glass
  • Display – Screen Size – 4.7 inches
  • CPU – Dual-core 1.84 GHz Twister
  • Memory – 32GB
  • Camera – 12mp
  • Sound – Loudspeaker & 3.5mm jack
  • Battery – Up to 14 hours talk time

Once a flagship Apple iPhone model the Apple iPhone S6 32GB is still a great sim free deal with amazing key features. Price £449

Apple iPhone SE 32GB Sim Free Deal

  • Released – March 2016
  • Build – Aluminium Body with Front Glass
  • Display – Screen Size – 4.0 inches
  • CPU – Dual-core 1.84 GHz Twister
  • Memory – 32GB
  • Camera – 12mp
  • Sound – Loudspeaker & 3.5mm jack
  • Battery – Up to 14 hours talk time

A very affordable iPhone that packs a serious punch for the cost. The Apple iPhone SE is a cheap iPhone with some very good features. Price £349

Samsung Galaxy J5 Sim Free Deal

  • Released – June 2015
  • Build – Plastic Body
  • Display – Screen Size – 5.0 inches
  • CPU – Quad-core 1.2 GHz Cortex-A53
  • Memory – 16GB
  • Camera – 13mp
  • Sound – Loudspeaker & 3.5mm jack
  • Battery – Up to 18 hours talk time

The Samsung Galaxy J5 doesn’t have the grace of the iPhone 6S or iPhone SE but it does pack a punch when it comes to talk time and battery life. Price £202

Nokia 5 Sim Free Deal

  • Released – July 2017
  • Build – Aluminium body with front glass
  • Display – Screen Size – 5.2 inches
  • CPU – Octa-core 1.4 GHz Cortex-A53
  • Memory – 16GB
  • Camera – 13mp
  • Sound – Loudspeaker & 3.5mm jack
  • Battery – Up to 14 hours talk time

Nokia are now breaking back into the smart phone market with simple yet elegant designs. The specifications are along way off the leading Apple iPhone and Samsung Galaxy mobile phones but at such an affordable cost it’s a simple and reliable phone with all the key features you expect from a smart phone. Price £170

Huawei P Smart Sim Free Deal

  • Released – December 2017
  • Build – Aluminium body with front glass
  • Display – Screen Size – 5.65 inches
  • CPU – Octa-core (4x 2.36 GHz Cortex-A53 & 4x 1.7 GHz Cortex-A53)
  • Memory – Up to 256GB
  • Camera – Dual 13mp + 2mp
  • Sound – Loudspeaker & 3.5mm jack
  • Battery – Up to 14 hours talk time

The Huawei P Smart is a great phone for the cost. The camera is a very high spec for the price and the £50 PayPal credit brings the cost of the phone down considerably. Price £229

For other sim free deals and offers visit our sim free deals here
